1.0.name: wordpress/firmasite-theme-enhancer
1.0.description:
This plugin provides new features to themes. Twitter Bootstrap design elements, custom editor buttons and more.

This plugin is supporting FirmaSite theme's theme style changes. I suggest you use theme + plugin together. You can find detailed information, showcase, live demo, tips and tricks about theme in: http://theme.firmasite.com/ You can check screenshots or watch this short video:

Sponsored by: FirmaSite
